name: My Twitter Timelines
author: Audacio Tech IT

sections.description:
Demo & Documentation :: http://audaciotech.com/wordpress/documentation/

You do not have to install multiple Twitter widgets any more to manage Twitter feeds on your website. Just install My Twitter Timelines and enjoy!

My Twitter Timelines offers a plethora of embeddable tools that integrates Twitter and displays Tweets on your WordPress site. In other words, by using our widget, you can display your own Twitter feeds on your website.

My Twitter Timelines do not only have one feature; this widget can be your complete Twitter solution. By using this widget you can display various timelines at a time, which are:

  1. User Timelines
  2. User Favorite Timelines
  3. Search Timeline
  4. List Timeline
  5. Collection Timeline

Highly Customizable:

Not only does the widget provide many options to display Twitter timelines, it also has many customizable options. You can control over many Twitter settings from backend.

We have included necessary documentation to make sure that you are able to use the widget properly on your website.

We love helping people and we are open to answer any questions you may have.
sections.installation:
1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. go to Widgets page and Enjoy our Plugin.

For more details about widget settings go here –

http://audaciotech.com/wordpress/documentation/
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Upload plugin directory to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. go to Widgets page and Enjoy our Plugin.

For more details about widget settings go here –

http://audaciotech.com/wordpress/documentation/

Can I see any demo of the widget plugin?

http://audaciotech.com/wordpress/documentation/

If I need any support can I ask?

Yep sure!! you can email us in – audaciotechit@outlook.com
